title: Firefox saves downloads in C:\Users\******\AppData\Local\Temp.
content: Most downloaded files are saved in the downloads folder as it should be but some files are being stored in C:\Users\******\AppData\Local\Temp. Why is that and can I change it so that all downloads are actually being saved in the downloads folder?
creator: darek092003
